Deal.sourceText: fragment Deal on Deal { projectManager { ...SmallTag } projectLead { ...SmallTag } site { ...SmallTag } stage { ...SmallTag } architect { ...SmallTag } area { ...SmallTag } archive { ...SmallTag } place { ...SmallTag } qualification { ...SmallTag } mathArea { ...SmallTag } diameter { ...SmallTag }}

Event.sourceText: fragment Event on Event { __typename	... on EventFileDownloaded { ...EventFileDownloaded }	... on EventFileUploaded { ...EventFileUploaded }	... on EventFileDeleted { ...EventFileDeleted } ... on EventFileDownloadRequested { ...EventFileDownloadRequested }	... on EventFileTagsEdited { ...EventFileTagsEdited }	... on EventTagApprovalIsRequested { ...EventTagApprovalIsRequested }}

EventFileDeleted.sourceText: fragment EventFileDeleted on EventFileDeleted { file { ...File } createdAt}

EventFileDownloadRequested.sourceText: fragment EventFileDownloadRequested on EventFileDownloadRequested { file { ...File } user { ...User } decision createdAt}

EventFileDownloaded.sourceText: fragment EventFileDownloaded on EventFileDownloaded { file { ...File } createdAt}

EventFileTagsEdited.sourceText: fragment EventFileTagsEdited on EventFileTagsEdited { file { ...File } addedTags { ...Tag } removedTags { ...Tag } createdAt}

EventFileUploaded.sourceText: fragment EventFileUploaded on EventFileUploaded { file { ...File } createdAt}

EventTagApprovalIsRequested.sourceText: fragment EventTagApprovalIsRequested on EventTagApprovalIsRequested { tag { ...Tag } author { ...User } alreadyInCatalog createdAt}

File.sourceText: fragment File on File { id filename mimeType previewUrl createdAt sizeInBytes user { name }}

Group.sourceText: fragment Group on Group { id name first10Tags { ...Tag } limitOfDownloadsPerDay}

GroupUser.sourceText: fragment GroupUser on GroupUser { inGroup user { ...User }}

MultipartUploadSession.sourceText: fragment MultipartUploadSession on MultipartUploadSession { id initialUploadURLs { ...UploadUrl }}

PendingUser.sourceText: fragment PendingUser on PendingUser { ttl name email groups { ...Group } createdAt}

PutUploadSession.sourceText: fragment PutUploadSession on PutUploadSession { id uploadURL { ...UploadUrl }}

SearchFile.sourceText: fragment SearchFile on SearchFile { file { ...File } tags { ...SmallTag }}

SmallTag.sourceText: fragment SmallTag on Tag { id tag}

Tag.sourceText: fragment Tag on Tag { id tag isFavourite hasChildren isApproved}

UploadUrl.sourceText: fragment UploadUrl on UploadUrl { url headers { key value }}

User.sourceText: fragment User on User { id name email tenGroups { id name } createdAt}

UsersTag.sourceText: fragment UsersTag on UsersTag { tag { id tag } usersCount createdAt}

AddTagsToFiles.name: AddTagsToFiles
AddTagsToFiles.sourceText: mutation AddTagsToFiles($fileIds: [UUID!]!, $tagIds: [UUID!]!) { error: addTagsToFiles(fileIds: $fileIds, tagIds: $tagIds) { __typename ... on ErrorUnknownTags { ...ErrorUnknownTags } ... on ErrorUnknownFiles { ...ErrorUnknownFiles } }}

AddUserToGroup.name: AddUserToGroup
AddUserToGroup.sourceText: mutation AddUserToGroup($groupId: UUID!, $userId: UUID!) { error: addUserToGroup(groupId: $groupId, userId: $userId) { __typename }}

ChangePassword.name: ChangePassword
ChangePassword.sourceText: mutation ChangePassword($oldPassword: String!, $newPassword: String!) { error: changePassword( oldPassword: $oldPassword, newPassword: $newPassword ) { __typename }}

CommitMultipartFileSession.name: CommitMultipartFileSession
CommitMultipartFileSession.sourceText: mutation CommitMultipartFileSession($sessionId: UUID!) { commitMultipartFileSession(sessionId: $sessionId) { __typename ... on File { id } }}

CommitPutFileSession.name: CommitPutFileSession
CommitPutFileSession.sourceText: mutation CommitPutFileSession($sessionId: UUID!) { commitPutFileSession(sessionId: $sessionId) { __typename ... on File { id } }}

ConfirmOTPCode.name: ConfirmOTPCode
ConfirmOTPCode.sourceText: mutation ConfirmOTPCode($email: String!, $code: String!) { confirmOTPCode(email: $email, code: $code) { __typename ... on OTPToken { token } }}

ConfirmUser.name: ConfirmUser
ConfirmUser.sourceText: mutation ConfirmUser($token: String!, $password: String!) { confirmUser(token: $token, password: $password) { error: __typename }}

CreateGroup.name: CreateGroup
CreateGroup.sourceText: mutation CreateGroup($groupIn: GroupIn!, $userIds: [UUID!]!) { error: createGroup(groupIn: $groupIn, userIds: $userIds) { __typename ... on ErrorUnknownTags { tagIds } }}

CreateMultipartFileSession.name: CreateMultipartFileSession
CreateMultipartFileSession.sourceText: mutation CreateMultipartFileSession($fileIn: MultipartUploadFileIn!) { session: createMultipartFileSession(fileIn: $fileIn) { __typename ... on MultipartUploadSession { ...MultipartUploadSession } ... on ErrorUnknownTags { ...ErrorUnknownTags } }}

CreatePutFileSession.name: CreatePutFileSession
CreatePutFileSession.sourceText: mutation CreatePutFileSession($fileIn: PutUploadFileIn!) { session: createPutFileSession(fileIn: $fileIn) { __typename ... on PutUploadSession { ...PutUploadSession } ... on ErrorUnknownTags { ...ErrorUnknownTags } }}

CreateUser.name: CreateUser
CreateUser.sourceText: mutation CreateUser($userIn: UserIn!) { createUser(userIn: $userIn) { error: __typename ... on ErrorUnknownGroups { groupIds } }}

DecideOnDownloadRequest.name: DecideOnDownloadRequest
DecideOnDownloadRequest.sourceText: mutation DecideOnDownloadRequest( $fileId: UUID!, $userId: UUID!, $allowed: Boolean!,) { error: decideOnDownloadRequest( fileId: $fileId, userId: $userId, allowed: $allowed, ) { __typename }}

EditGroup.name: EditGroup
EditGroup.sourceText: mutation EditGroup($id: UUID!, $groupIn: GroupIn!) { error: editGroup(id: $id, groupIn: $groupIn) { __typename ... on ErrorUnknownTags { tagIds } }}

EditTag.name: EditTag
EditTag.sourceText: mutation EditTag($id: UUID!, $tag: TagIn!) { error: editTag(id: $id, tag: $tag) { __typename }}

GetDeals.name: GetDeals
GetDeals.sourceText: query GetDeals($skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $query: String){ deals: getDeals(skip: $skip, limit: $limit, query: $query) { ...SmallTag }}

GetEvents.name: GetEvents
GetEvents.sourceText: query GetEvents( $skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $dateRange: DateRange!, $filters: EventFiltersIn!, $query: String) { events: getEvents( skip: $skip, limit: $limit, dateRange: $dateRange, filters: $filters, query: $query, ) { __typename ... on EventsList { events { ...Event } } }}

GetFavouriteTags.name: GetFavouriteTags
GetFavouriteTags.sourceText: query GetFavouriteTags($skip: Int!, $limit: Int!) { data: getFavouriteTags(skip: $skip, limit: $limit) { ...Tag }}

GetFileURL.name: GetFileURL
GetFileURL.sourceText: query GetFileURL($id: UUID!) { url: getFileURL(id: $id) { __typename ... on UrlObject { value } }}

GetFiles.name: GetFiles
GetFiles.sourceText: query GetFiles( $skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $tagIds: [UUID!]!, $sortBy: FileSortBy) { data: getFiles( skip: $skip, limit: $limit, tagIds: $tagIds, sortBy: $sortBy ) { __typename ... on ErrorUnknownTags { ...ErrorUnknownTags } ... on SearchFileList { ...SearchFileList } }}

GetFilesCount.name: GetFilesCount
GetFilesCount.sourceText: query GetFilesCount($tagIds: [UUID!]!) { count: getFilesCount(tagIds: $tagIds) { __typename ... on ErrorUnknownTags { ...ErrorUnknownTags } ... on IntObject { ...IntObject } }}

GetGroupTags.name: GetGroupTags
GetGroupTags.sourceText: query GetGroupTags($id: UUID!, $skip: Int!, $limit: Int!) { tags: getGroupTags(id: $id, skip: $skip, limit: $limit) { __typename ... on TagList { list { ...Tag } } }}

GetGroupUsers.name: GetGroupUsers
GetGroupUsers.sourceText: query GetGroupUsers( $groupId: UUID!, $skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $sortBy: GetGroupUsersSortBy!) { users: getGroupUsers( groupId: $groupId, skip: $skip, limit: $limit, sortBy: $sortBy ) { __typename ... on UsersList { ...UsersList } }}

GetGroupUsersAndTotal.name: GetGroupUsersAndTotal
GetGroupUsersAndTotal.sourceText: query GetGroupUsersAndTotal( $groupId: UUID!, $skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $sortBy: GetGroupUsersSortBy!) { users: getGroupUsers( groupId: $groupId, skip: $skip, limit: $limit, sortBy: $sortBy ) { __typename ... on UsersList { ...UsersList } } total: getGroupUsersTotal(groupId: $groupId) { __typename ... on IntObject { value } } group: retrieveGroup(id: $groupId) { __typename ... on Group { name } }}

GetGroupUsersAndUsers.name: GetGroupUsersAndUsers
GetGroupUsersAndUsers.sourceText: query GetGroupUsersAndUsers( $skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $groupId: UUID!, $sortBy: GetUsersSortBy!, $query: String) { users: getGroupUsersAndUsers( skip: $skip, limit: $limit, sortBy: $sortBy, groupId: $groupId, query: $query ) { __typename ... on GroupUserList { ...GroupUserList } }}

GetGroupUsersAndUsersAndTotal.name: GetGroupUsersAndUsersAndTotal
GetGroupUsersAndUsersAndTotal.sourceText: query GetGroupUsersAndUsersAndTotal( $skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $groupId: UUID!, $sortBy: GetUsersSortBy!, $query: String) { users: getGroupUsersAndUsers( skip: $skip, limit: $limit, sortBy: $sortBy, groupId: $groupId, query: $query ) { __typename ... on GroupUserList { ...GroupUserList } } total: getUsersTotal(query: $query)}

GetGroupUsersTotal.name: GetGroupUsersTotal
GetGroupUsersTotal.sourceText: query GetGroupUsersTotal($groupId: UUID!) { total: getGroupUsersTotal(groupId: $groupId) { __typename ... on IntObject { value } }}

GetGroups.name: GetGroups
GetGroups.sourceText: query GetGroups($skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $sortBy: GetGroupsSortBy!) { groups: getGroups(skip: $skip, limit: $limit, sortBy: $sortBy) { ...Group }}

GetGroupsAndTotal.name: GetGroupsAndTotal
GetGroupsAndTotal.sourceText: query GetGroupsAndTotal($skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $sortBy: GetGroupsSortBy!) { groups: getGroups(skip: $skip, limit: $limit, sortBy: $sortBy) { ...Group } total: getGroupsTotal}

GetMe.name: GetMe
GetMe.sourceText: query GetMe { getMe { name email tenGroups { name } }}

GetMyTags.name: GetMyTags
GetMyTags.sourceText: query GetMyTags($skip: Int!, $limit: Int!) { tags: getMyTags( skip: $skip, limit: $limit ) { ...Tag }}

GetNextMultipartUploadUrls.name: GetNextMultipartUploadUrls
GetNextMultipartUploadUrls.sourceText: query GetNextMultipartUploadUrls( $sessionId: UUID!, $lastPart: Int!, $limit: Int!) { getNextMultipartUploadUrls( sessionId: $sessionId, lastPart: $lastPart, limit: $limit ) { __typename ... on UploadUrlList { urls { ...UploadUrl } } }}

GetPathToTag.name: GetPathToTag
GetPathToTag.sourceText: query GetPathToTag($tagId: UUID!) { getPathToTag(tagId: $tagId) { __typename ... on StringList { values } ... on ErrorUnknownTags { ...ErrorUnknownTags } }}

GetPopularTags.name: GetPopularTags
GetPopularTags.sourceText: query GetPopularTags($skip: Int!, $limit: Int!) { data: getPopularTags( skip: $skip, limit: $limit ) { ...Tag }}

GetTagChildren.name: GetTagChildren
GetTagChildren.sourceText: query GetTagChildren($tagId: UUID!) { tags: getTagChildren(tagId: $tagId) { __typename ... on TagList { list { ...Tag } } }}

GetTagInfo.name: GetTagInfo
GetTagInfo.sourceText: query GetTagInfo($tagId: UUID!) { info: getTagInfo(tagId: $tagId) { __typename ... on TagInfo { tag parentTag { ...Tag } } }}

GetTags.name: GetTags
GetTags.sourceText: query GetTags($skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $parentTagId: UUID, $query: String) { data: getTags( skip: $skip, limit: $limit, parentTagId: $parentTagId, query: $query ) { __typename ... on TagList { ...TagList } ... on ErrorUnknownTags { ...ErrorUnknownTags } }}

GetTagsCount.name: GetTagsCount
GetTagsCount.sourceText: query GetTagsCount($parentTag: String, $query: String) { data: getTagsCount( parentTag: $parentTag, query: $query ) { __typename ... on IntObject { value } ... on ErrorUnknownTags { ...ErrorUnknownTags } }}

GetUploadedFiles.name: GetUploadedFiles
GetUploadedFiles.sourceText: query GetUploadedFiles( $skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $sortBy: FileSortBy) { data: getUploadedFiles( skip: $skip, limit: $limit, sortBy: $sortBy ) { __typename ... on ErrorUnknownTags { ...ErrorUnknownTags } ... on SearchFileList { ...SearchFileList } }}

GetUploadedFilesCount.name: GetUploadedFilesCount
GetUploadedFilesCount.sourceText: query GetUploadedFilesCount { count: getUploadedFilesCount { __typename ... on ErrorUnknownTags { ...ErrorUnknownTags } ... on IntObject { ...IntObject } }}

GetUsers.name: GetUsers
GetUsers.sourceText: query GetUsers( $skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $sortBy: GetUsersSortBy!, $query: String) { users: getUsers( skip: $skip, limit: $limit, sortBy: $sortBy, query: $query ) { ...UsersList }}

GetUsersTags.name: GetUsersTags
GetUsersTags.sourceText: query GetUsersTags( $skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $query: String, $sortBy: UsersTagSortBy) { tags: getUsersTags( skip: $skip, limit: $limit, query: $query, sortBy: $sortBy ) { ...UsersTag }}

GetUsersTagsAndCount.name: GetUsersTagsAndCount
GetUsersTagsAndCount.sourceText: query GetUsersTagsAndCount( $skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $query: String) { tags: getUsersTags( skip: $skip, limit: $limit, query: $query ) { ...UsersTag } count: getUsersTagsCount(query: $query)}

GetUsersTotalAndUsers.name: GetUsersTotalAndUsers
GetUsersTotalAndUsers.sourceText: query GetUsersTotalAndUsers( $skip: Int!, $limit: Int!, $sortBy: GetUsersSortBy!, $query: String) { total: getUsersTotal(query: $query) users: getUsers( skip: $skip, limit: $limit, sortBy: $sortBy, query: $query ) { ...UsersList }}

IsAllowedToDownload.name: IsAllowedToDownload
IsAllowedToDownload.sourceText: query IsAllowedToDownload($id: UUID!) { allowed: isAllowedToDownload(id: $id) { __typename ... on BooleanObject { value } }}

Login.name: Login
Login.sourceText: mutation Login($email: String!, $password: String!) { login(email: $email, password: $password) { error: __typename }}

RemoveUserFromGroup.name: RemoveUserFromGroup
RemoveUserFromGroup.sourceText: mutation RemoveUserFromGroup($groupId: UUID!, $userId: UUID!) { error: removeUserFromGroup(groupId: $groupId, userId: $userId) { __typename }}

ResetPassword.name: ResetPassword
ResetPassword.sourceText: mutation ResetPassword($token: String!, $newPassword: String!) { error: resetPassword(token: $token, newPassword: $newPassword) { __typename }}

RetrieveFile.name: RetrieveFile
RetrieveFile.sourceText: query RetrieveFile($id: UUID!) { file: retrieveFile(id: $id) { __typename ... on SearchFile { tags { ...SmallTag } file { filename } } }}

RetrieveGroupAndTags.name: RetrieveGroupAndTags
RetrieveGroupAndTags.sourceText: query RetrieveGroupAndTags($id: UUID!) { group: retrieveGroup(id: $id) { __typename ... on Group { ...Group } } tags: getGroupTags(id: $id, skip: 0, limit: 10000000) { __typename ... on TagList { list { ...Tag } } }}

SetTagIsFavourite.name: SetTagIsFavourite
SetTagIsFavourite.sourceText: mutation SetTagIsFavourite($tagId: UUID!, $isFavourite: Boolean!) { setTagIsFavourite(tagId: $tagId, isFavourite: $isFavourite) { error: __typename }}

UpdateFile.name: UpdateFile
UpdateFile.sourceText: mutation UpdateFile($id: UUID!, $name: String!, $tagIds: [UUID!]!) { error: updateFile(id: $id, name: $name, tagIds: $tagIds) { __typename ... on ErrorUnknownTags { ...ErrorUnknownTags } }}

UploadDealTable.name: UploadDealTable
UploadDealTable.sourceText: mutation UploadDealTable($file: Upload!) { error: uploadDealTable(file: $file) { message }}
